member.name: T:SpaceAnalysis.Acoustics.AudibilityGrid
member.summary: Grid of audibility values ranging from 0 (not audible) to 1 (audible).

member.name: M:SpaceAnalysis.Acoustics.AudibilityGrid.BySoundField(SpaceAnalysis.Acoustics.SoundField)
member.summary: Create AudibilityGrid using a soundField.
member.param: SoundField from which to create an AudibilityGrid

member.name: M:SpaceAnalysis.Acoustics.AudibilityGrid.ByUnion(System.Collections.Generic.List{SpaceAnalysis.Acoustics.SoundField})
member.summary: Create a AudibilityGrid by the union of sound fields.
member.param: List of SoundField objects from which to create an AudibilityGrid

member.name: M:SpaceAnalysis.Acoustics.AudibilityGrid.ByIntersection(System.Collections.Generic.List{SpaceAnalysis.Acoustics.SoundField})
member.summary: Create a AudibilityGrid by the intersection of soundFields.
member.param: List of SoundField objects from which to create an AudibilityGrid

member.name: M:SpaceAnalysis.Acoustics.AudibilityGrid.Values
member.summary: 2D grid of audibility values, which range from 0.0 (completely invisible) to 1.0 (completely visible).
member.returns: Audibility values, which range from 0.0 (completely invisible) to 1.0 (completely visible)

member.name: M:SpaceAnalysis.Acoustics.AudibilityGrid.ValueAtPoint(Autodesk.DesignScript.Geometry.Point)
member.summary: Get audibility at a point.
member.returns: Audibility value, which ranges from 0.0 (completely invisible) to 1.0 (completely visible)

member.summary: List of X Coordinates

member.summary: List of Y Coordinates

member.summary: 2D List of Points

member.name: M:SpaceAnalysis.Acoustics.AudibilityGrid.Surface
member.summary: Get the bounding surface of the AudibilityGrid

member.name: T:SpaceAnalysis.Acoustics.SoundField
member.summary: Field of sound paths eminating from a single sound point. Used to compute audibility grids.

member.name: M:SpaceAnalysis.Acoustics.SoundField.BySpaceLatticeAndSoundPoint(SpaceAnalysis.Core.SpaceLattice,Autodesk.DesignScript.Geometry.Point,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Computes a field of propagated sound intensities from a single point.
member.param: SpaceLattice from which to create a SoundField
Origin of sound
Radius of sound field
Relative intensity of sound source (0 to 1)
Rate of absorption over distance (0 to 1)

member.name: M:SpaceAnalysis.Acoustics.SoundField.BySpaceLatticeAndSoundSystem(SpaceAnalysis.Core.SpaceLattice,SpaceAnalysis.Acoustics.SoundSystem,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Computes a field of propagated sound intensities from a set of sources.
member.param: SpaceLattice from which to create a SoundField
SoundSystem defining the sources of the sound
Radius of sound field
Relative intensity of sound source (0 to 1)
Rate of absorption over distance (0 to 1)

member.name: M:SpaceAnalysis.Acoustics.SoundField.Wavelength(SpaceAnalysis.Acoustics.SoundField)
member.summary: Wavelength of the sound waves in the acoustics simulation.
member.param: SoundField from which to obtain the wavelength

member.name: T:SpaceAnalysis.Acoustics.SoundSystem
member.summary: Sound system with multiple sources and local intensities.

member.name: M:SpaceAnalysis.Acoustics.SoundSystem.BySoundPoints(System.Collections.Generic.List{Autodesk.DesignScript.Geometry.Point})
member.summary: Represents a sound system with multiple sources.
member.param: List of sound points

member.name: M:SpaceAnalysis.Acoustics.SoundSystem.BySoundPointsAndIntensities(System.Collections.Generic.List{Autodesk.DesignScript.Geometry.Point},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Double})
member.summary: Represents a sound system with multiple sources.
member.param: List of sound points
List of local intensities associated with each point (0 to 1)

member.name: T:SpaceAnalysis.Pathfinding.PathField
member.summary: Field of paths converging on a single end point or starting from a single start point. Used to pre-compute routes.

member.name: M:SpaceAnalysis.Pathfinding.PathField.BySpaceLatticeAndStartPoint(SpaceAnalysis.Core.SpaceLattice,Autodesk.DesignScript.Geometry.Point)
member.summary: Computes a field of paths from a single start point.
member.param: SpaceLattice from which to create a PathField
Start point of all routes

member.name: M:SpaceAnalysis.Pathfinding.PathField.BySpaceLatticeAndEndPoint(SpaceAnalysis.Core.SpaceLattice,Autodesk.DesignScript.Geometry.Point)
member.summary: Computes a field of paths converging on a single end point.
member.param: SpaceLattice from which to create a PathField
End point of all routes

member.name: T:SpaceAnalysis.Pathfinding.Route
member.summary: Object representing the shortest Route from a start point to an end point.

member.name: M:SpaceAnalysis.Pathfinding.Route.ByPathField(SpaceAnalysis.Pathfinding.PathField,Autodesk.DesignScript.Geometry.Point)
member.summary: Find the shortest Route using a pre-computed field of paths from a PathField.
member.param: PathField from which to create a Route
End point of route

member.name: M:SpaceAnalysis.Pathfinding.Route.BySpaceLattice(SpaceAnalysis.Core.SpaceLattice,Autodesk.DesignScript.Geometry.Point,Autodesk.DesignScript.Geometry.Point)
member.summary: Find the shortest Route using a SpaceLattice. Best used for a single Route: use PathField to calculate multiple paths with a common start or end point.
member.param: SpaceLattice from which to create a Route
Start point of route
End point of route

member.name: M:SpaceAnalysis.Pathfinding.Route.Count
member.summary: Number of points in the route.
member.returns: Number of points along the route

member.summary: Get the X position of the point at the given index.
member.param: Index of point along the route
member.returns: X position of point along the route

member.name: M:SpaceAnalysis.Pathfinding.Route.YPositionAtIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the Y position of the point at the given index.
member.param: Index of point along the route
member.returns: Y position of point along the route

member.name: M:SpaceAnalysis.Pathfinding.Route.Points(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the points along the Route.
member.param: Number of tidy/smoothing iterations, where each tidy operation straightens the route while respecting the barriers in the SpaceLattice. Setting the value to 0 will return the raw route path.

member.name: M:SpaceAnalysis.Pathfinding.Route.Curve(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get a PolyCurve object representing the Route.
member.param: Number of tidy/smoothing iterations, where each tidy operation straightens the route while respecting the barriers in the SpaceLattice. Setting the value to 0 will return the raw route path.
